title: Scholarship
content: It is necessary to attend the first day of 2nd semester but if we don't attend we don't get college incentives like scholarship . If I submit the medical form along with the apology letter will there be any problem related to scholarships?

comments.body:
That's what they told you?

I swear this college is run by some psychopathic highly regarded mfs
True what is this weird ass rule
It's bs I'm in 4th sem rn and most of my scholarship getting friends didn't come for the first day cus they were out of station and they all got the scholarship mail yesterday
nah u can skip they donâ€™t care no need medical also
Ur 100% sure?? Coz I didn't attend 2 classes today... Welp...
